text: Hak phwk cea peidphey sing thi hı pen than man k pen sing thi di xyu læa tha hak phwk cea pkpid man læa hı man kæ br rda phu yakcn læw man k pen sing thi di kæ phwk cea ying kwa læa phraxngkh ca thrng lblang xxk cak phwk cea sung bang swn ca ka brrda khwam phid khxng phwk cea læa xallxh nan thrng rxbru xyang thithwn nı sing thi phwk cea kratha kan xyu
